Package multimonster.common.pipe

Class Summary
BufferedChannel A Channel to transfer data which uses a RingBuffer.
Channel Represents a Channel for a Pipe to transfer data.
Pipe Transfers Data und Data-Control-Info from one component to the other.
 

Exception Summary
ChannelClosedException Indicates that the Channel is closed and the requested operation failed.
PipeClosedException Indicates that the Pipe is closed and the requested operation failed.
